pages.text: 843.225.3818 1750 Savannah Hwy. Chas. Welcome to Our Menu Specials Bar Open: 11:00 AM - MIDNIGHTGrill: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PMHappy Hour: 4:00 - 7:00 M-F Welcome to Hunley's! Your neighborhood bar & grill. Located on Savannah Highway in West Ashley,SC - Hunley's Neighborhood Grill is ready to make sure you're entertained, well fed and leave with a smile on your face. Our tavern a place where you can enjoy good food, good friends and catch the game of your choice on any one of our multiple TV's. Hunley's has some of the best drink specials in Charleston!Our wings have the Holy City raving! The wings are hot, crisp and can be ordered with a variety of flavor options and adjusted to your personal heat preference. Stop by today and try them for yourself!!! Menu Check Our Tasty Menu All Starters Wings Salads Sandwiches Kids Other Potato Skins (5) $10.00 Topped with smoked bacon, green onions, and plenty of sharp cheddar and Monterey Jack Cheese. Mozzarella Sticks (6) $10.00 Perfectly golden on the outside, oozing with cheese on the inside. Served with marinara sauce. Hand-Battered Mushrooms (6-8) $10.00 They'll 'pop' when you cut into them they are so fresh. Hand-Battered Onion Rings $10.00 A super crispy crust and sweet interior. Hand-Battered Zucchini $10.00 Fried to perfection, crispy on the outside, jucy and delicious in the center. Basket of Fries or Tots $8.00 Deliciously golden basket of french fries or tater tots. Double Ranch Cheese Fries / Tots $12.00 Your choice of cheese fries or tater tots served with lots of ranch! House-Made Buffalo Dip $10.00 Our home-made tangy, creamy Buffalo chicken dip served with home-made pita chips! Locally-made Lumpia $10.00 Shatteringly crisp and stuffed with traditional juicy fillings and flavor. Fresh Veggie Platter $10.00 Carrots, Celery, Cucumber, Broccoli and Mushrooms. Sampler Platter $16.00 3 Fried Mushrooms, 3Potato Skins and 3 Mozzarella Sticks. Chicken Quesadilla $14.00 A blend of cheeses and cooked to perfection chicken. Steak Quesadilla $15.00 A blend of cheese and cooked to perfection steak. Add mushrooms/jalapeno for $1. Wings (10) $15.00 FLAVORS: Hot, Medium, Mild, Teriyaki, Spicy Teriyaki, Dry Ranch, Garlic Pepper, Hot Garlic, Cajun, Lemon Pepper, Honey Mustard, Lemon Garlic Pepper, Dry Ranch, Old Bay, Garlic Parmesan, Hot Garlic Parmesan, Gold BBQ, Red BBQ, Hot Lemon Pepper, Caribbean Jerk, Hot Honey Mustard, Old Bay / Dry Ranch Mix or just plain naked! Served with Ranch or Bleu Cheese Dressing and celery and carrots. Extra veggies or dressing are add'l $1. All Flats or Drummies $2.00 per 10 wings. Wings (20) $26.00 FLAVORS: Hot, Medium, Mild, Teriyaki, Spicy Teriyaki, Dry Ranch, Garlic Pepper, Hot Garlic, Cajun, Lemon Pepper, Honey Mustard, Lemon Garlic Pepper, Dry Ranch, Old Bay, Garlic Parmesan, Hot Garlic Parmesan, Gold BBQ, Red BBQ, Hot Lemon Pepper, Caribbean Jerk, Hot Honey Mustard, Old Bay / Dry Ranch Mix or just plain naked! Served with Ranch or Bleu Cheese Dressing and celery and carrots. Extra veggies or dressing are add'l $1. All Flats or Drummies $2.00 per 10 wings. 25 Wing Sampler (5 flavors) $32.00 FLAVORS: Hot, Medium, Mild, Teriyaki, Spicy Teriyaki, Dry Ranch, Garlic Pepper, Hot Garlic, Cajun, Lemon Pepper, Honey Mustard, Lemon Garlic Pepper, Dry Ranch, Old Bay, Garlic Parmesan, Hot Garlic Parmesan, Gold BBQ, Red BBQ, Hot Lemon Pepper, Caribbean Jerk, Hot Honey Mustard, Old Bay / Dry Ranch Mix or just plain naked! Served with Ranch or Bleu Cheese Dressing and celery and carrots. Extra veggies or dressing are add'l $1. All Flats or Drummies $2.00 per 10 wings. 5 Wings & Fries $12.00 FLAVORS: Hot, Medium, Mild, Teriyaki, Spicy Teriyaki, Dry Ranch, Garlic Pepper, Hot Garlic, Cajun, Lemon Pepper, Honey Mustard, Lemon Garlic Pepper, Dry Ranch, Old Bay, Garlic Parmesan, Hot Garlic Parmesan, Gold BBQ, Red BBQ, Hot Lemon Pepper, Caribbean Jerk, Hot Honey Mustard, Old Bay / Dry Ranch Mix or just plain naked! Served with Ranch or Bleu Cheese Dressing and celery and carrots. Extra veggies or dressing are add'l $1. All Flats or Drummies $2.00 per 10 wings. 10 Wings & Fries $18.00 FLAVORS: Hot, Medium, Mild, Teriyaki, Spicy Teriyaki, Dry Ranch, Garlic Pepper, Hot Garlic, Cajun, Lemon Pepper, Honey Mustard, Lemon Garlic Pepper, Dry Ranch, Old Bay, Garlic Parmesan, Hot Garlic Parmesan, Gold BBQ, Red BBQ, Hot Lemon Pepper, Caribbean Jerk, Hot Honey Mustard, Old Bay / Dry Ranch Mix or just plain naked! Served with Ranch or Bleu Cheese Dressing and celery and carrots. Extra veggies or dressing are add'l $1. All Flats or Drummies $2.00 per 10 wings. Hunley's Side Salad $8.00 Served with Tomatoes, Onions, Cucumbers, Croutons and Cheddar cheese House-Made Dressings: Ranch, Bleu Cheese, 1,000 Island, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Honey Mustard, Italian and Greek. Extra dressings $1.00 Add grilled chicken or jerk chicken for just $7.00! Ultimate Chef Salad $15.00 Served with Turkey, Ham, Eggs, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Mushrooms, Bacon, Croutons and Cheddar. House-Made Dressings: Ranch, Bleu Cheese, 1,000 Island, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Honey Mustard, Italian and Greek. Extra dressings $1.00 Greek Chicken Salad $17.00 Served with Grilled Chicken, Feta, Black Olives, Red onions, Cucumber and Banana Peppers. House-Made Dressings: Ranch, Bleu Cheese, 1,000 Island, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Honey Mustard, Italian and Greek. Extra dressings $1.00 House Hunley's Burger $16.00 1/2 lb. Fresh Patty served with hot crumbled bleu cheese, bacon, lettuce, tomato and onions. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $2.00!Substitute for a Side Salad for just $3.50! The Plain Jane Burger $14.00 1/2 lb. Fresh Patty served with American Cheese, lettuce, onions and tomato. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Hunley's Beef on Weck $15.00 Slow roasted beef on a Kimmelweck roll dipped in caraway seeds and kosher salt with a side of au jus and horseradish. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Hunley's Torpedo $15.00 Sink the Housatonic with ham, turkey, roast beef, bacon, provolone, lettuce, tomato, onion and a side of Italian dressing on a hoagie. Your choice of hot or cold. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Club Sandwich $15.00 Ham, turkey, bacon lettuce, tomato, cheese and mayo on toasted bread. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Classic BLT $12.00 Traditional crispy Bacon, Lettuce and Tomato on toasted bread. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! The Deep South $10.00 Turkey with provolone cheese, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Fried Bologna $10.00 Thick sliced Bologna grilled with American cheese and mayo on toasted bread. Go ahead and add lettuce and tomato, we won’t tell. ;) All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! French Dip $15.00 Roast Beef, caramelized onions, swiss cheese on a French Roll with a side of au jus. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Grilled or Fried Chicken Sand. $15.00 Grilled or Fried, rolled in Buffalo Sauce or just Seasoned, Side of Bleu or Ranch, ‘served with lettuce, tomato and onion- make it your own creation! All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Chicken Philly $14.00 Sautéed bell peppers and onions, topped with choice of cheese and served on a toasted hoagie roll. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Steak Philly $15.00 Sautéed bell peppers and onions, topped with choice of cheese and served on a toasted hoagie roll. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Chicken Finger Basket $14.00 Your choice of grilled or fried. Have it tossed in your favorite seasoning! All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Hunley Dog (2) $10.00 Two dogs served with chili, cheese and onions. All sandwiches served with french fries. Or, substitute for a pasta salad, onion rings or tater tots for just $3.00! Substitute for a Side Salad for just $4.50! Kid's Grilled Cheese $7.00 Includes french fries and a drink. Add cheese for $1. Kid's Chicken Tenders $8.00 Includes french fries and a drink. (Grilled or fried.) Add cheese for $1. Kid's Hot dog $6.00 Includes french fries and a drink. Add cheese for $1. Kid's Burger $8.00 Includes french fries and a drink. Add cheese for $1. Bleu Cheese & Ranch Lovers $12.00 Your choice of a whole pint of bleu cheese or ranch dressing. Cheese Addition to your meal $1.00 Blue Cheese Crumbles, Cheddar, American, Provolone, Pepperjack or Swiss. Additional Toppings $1.00 ea. Jalapenos, Mushrooms, Chili, Onions, Banana Peppers, Fried Egg, Aujus or Gravy. Dressing, Celery or Carrots $1.00 ea. Extra dressings, celery or carrots are always available. *Item photos may differ from actual product.**Allergy Warning: Menu items may contain or come into contact with wheat, eggs, nuts and dairy. Ask our staff for more information. Specials Check Our Specials Monday's Tuesday's Wednesday's Thursday's Friday's Saturday & Sunday's Panini Sandwich $12.00 only! Grill Hours: Monday - Sunday, 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM Chef's Choice $12.00 only! Grill Hours: Monday - Sunday, 11:00 AM - 10:00 PMEnjoy our special chef's selection. Call 843-225-3818 for details. Chicken Liver or Fried Chicken $12.00 only! Grill Hours: Monday - Sunday, 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM Pork Chops (fried or grilled) $12.00 only! Grill Hours: Monday - Sunday, 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM All day Seafood Shrimp Basket, Fish basket or Seafood Platter Grill Hours: Monday - Sunday, 11:00 AM - 10:00 PMShrimp Basket $14.00 / Fish Basket $12.00 / Seafood Platter $18.00 Burgers All Day Grill Hours: Monday - Sunday, 11:00 AM - 10:00 PMAll-day burgers!Either for just $5.00, served with chips. Add cheese for just $1.00! Special Events Upcoming Events & Bookings: Host your event with us! Give us a call! 843.225.3818 We'd love to host your birthday party, family reunion, or any special event. Just give us a call for availability and pricing! Your BILLS games are HERE! Stop on in and watch all the action from your Buffalo Bills on any one of our multiple HDTVs!Visit the Bill's schedule . here Your SABRES games are HERE! Stop on in and watch all the action from your Buffalo Sabres on any one of our multiple HDTVs!Visit the Sabres schedule . here Gallery Some photos from Our Restaurant Contact Contact Us Location: 1750 Savannah Highway, Charleston, SC 29407 Our Hours Bar Hours: 11:00 AM - 12:00 AM (7 days) Grill Hours: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM (7 days) Happy Hour: 4:00 PM - 7:00 PM (M-F) Email: hunleys1865@gmail.com Call: 843.225.3818

843.225.3818 1750 Savannah Hwy. Chas. Welcome to Our Menu Specials Bar Open: 11:00 AM - MIDNIGHTGrill: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PMHappy Hour: 4:00 - 7:00 M-F Welcome to Hunley's! Your neighborhood bar & grill. Located on Savannah Highway in West Ashley,SC - Hunley's Neighborhood Grill is ready to make sure you're entertained, well fed and leave with a smile on your face. Our tavern a place where you can enjoy good food, good friends and catch the game of your choice on any one of our multiple TV's. Hunley's has some of the best drink specials in Charleston!Our wings have the Holy City raving! The wings are hot, crisp and can be ordered with a variety of flavor options and adjusted to your personal heat preference. Stop by today and try them for yourself!!!
